abstract: <jats:p>This scientific commentary refers to ‘A brain network for deep brain stimulation induced cognitive decline in Parkinson’s disease’ by Reich et al. (https://doi.org/10.1093/brain/awac012).</jats:p>
title: Connectomic imaging to predict and prevent cognitive decline after subthalamic DBS: next steps
